Name: Silver Bullet
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Nick & Nora glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: If you like Aviations then this caraway-influenced sour may appeal. It's powerfully flavoured, so also consider serving over ice to allow dilution to tame the flavours.
History: Thought to have been created in the 1920s.
Nutrition: One serving of Silver Bullet contains 157 calories
